mapper.select: SELECT POLLID, ID, QUESTION, SDATE, EDATE, ITEMCOUNT, POLLTOTAL, REGDATE FROM SISTPOLL ORDER BY SDATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SISTPOLL (POLLID, ID, QUESTION, SDATE, EDATE, ITEMCOUNT, POLLTOTAL, REGDATE) VALUES(SEQ_SIST_POLL.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{question}, #{sdate}, #{edate}, #{itemcount}, 0, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO SISTPOLLSUB (POLLSUBID, POLLID, ANSWER, ACOUNT) VALUES(SEQ_SIST_POLLSUB.NEXTVAL, (SELECT NVL(MAX(POLLID), 0) FROM SISTPOLL), #{answer}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT POLLID, ID, QUESTION, SDATE, EDATE, ITEMCOUNT, POLLTOTAL, REGDATE FROM SISTPOLL WHERE POLLID=#{pollid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SISTVOTER (VOTERID, POLLID, POLLSUBID, ID, REGDATE) VALUES(SEQ_SIST_VOTER.NEXTVAL, #{pollid}, #{pollsubid}, #{id}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE SISTPOLL SET POLLTOTAL=POLLTOTAL+1 WHERE POLLID=#{pollid}
